page.title: 06LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: At{Thornhill}there's a{park}called the{Rectory Park.} It's quite a big park. There is a{golf course,}where you can hire{clubs}and play golf. Further down in the park there's a {lake.} People used to go{swimming}in it, but it's{fenced off}now. Thornhill's got a lot of hills, and the park is on a hill. There's lots of{trees}and{flower beds}all over the park. There aren't many things for the{children}to play on, but there's lots of{grass}to play{games}on. People have{picnics}on the grass. There's a{shop}nearby for sweets as well. If it starts to{rain}when you're at the park there is a{shelter}to go under until it stops. There is a{car } {park}which is{free}of charge. There's also a block of{toilets,}which are supplied with washbasins.
